# Ramadan Preparation Course Website - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Next.js + Tailwind CSS website for Ramadan preparation course (brothers only)
- 16 classes covering complete Salah, 11 Surahs, and daily Masnun Duas
- YouTube video embeds for recorded classes
- Teacher profiles section
- Student registration form (no login system)
- Paid course (manual bKash payment, no payment gateway)
- Primary language: Bangla

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Hook Form for forms
- Bangla font support (Noto Sans Bengali)

## Setup Progress
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project
- [ ] Customize project structure
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Run development server

## Development Guidelines
- Use Bangla language for all content
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Keep UI clean and Islamic-themed
- No authentication system needed
- YouTube embed integration for video classes
